name: Enquir3 Feedback
author: Enquir3 Ltd

sections.description:
Please note that you are required to register with Enquir3 Ltd prior to being able to activate and use the plugin: contact Enquir3 Ltd on 0207 100 5180 or support@enquir3.com

Enquir3 are all about helping you to make the most out of your greatest asset: your existing clients.

The Enquir3 Feedback Plugin provides a system to effectively and aesthetically display your client’s true words on your website. It also allows you to add your personal comments to the feedback.

Enquir3 engage with your company’s clients in a structured but personal process, so that you can gain an insight into what they truly think about your business and services you offer.

This plugin provides a dedicated feedback page and several widgets that you can either use in your theme’s widget area or on your web pages. The plugin displays the feedback that is obtained through the Enquir3 Feedback system and is linked to our feedback database for support management and security. The widgets display recent feedback, summaries of your performance and what your customers feel about you.

** Features. **
Publish and display according to status
You control what is published and when
Customizable character limit
Star ratings
Responsive design, resizes to screen size
Cycle through recent feedback
Add your own comments in response to feedback
Use this plugin in conjunction with option Case Studies and referral plugins to enhance your website and client retention even further

For more information please visit https://www.enquir3.com/enquir3-feedback-plugin-suite-of-tools/

How To Use

Please refer to guidance notes for the “Enquir3 Feedback Plugin” available at https://www.enquir3.com/enquir3-feedback-plugin-suite-of-tools/
sections.installation:
For the Enquir3 Feedback Plugin to display feedback, you must first register for an audit from Enquir3 to gather open and honest feedback and for it to be stored on the Enquir3 database.
During the audit process Enquir3 will provide the details to connect to the database.

Once you receive the configuration information, install & activate the plugin. Options can be modified in the settings page to suit your requirements.
Please contact Enquir3 at support@enquire3.com or call us on 0207 100 5180
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • An attempt at getting the release to update on websites.

0.1.0

Initial Public Release

short_description: Display feedback from the Enquir3 system with specific pages and widgets.
